segment.source: How to Move an Application
segment.target: How to Move an Application

segment.source: How to Move an Application
segment.target: How to Move an Application

segment.source: How to Move an Application
segment.target: How to Move an Application

segment.source: If you have application groups under the Applications node in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can move an application between groups or from the main node to a group.
segment.target: If you have application groups under the Applications node in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, you can move an application between groups or from the main node to a group.

segment.source: You can move the applications to suit your operations.
segment.target: You can move the applications to suit your operations.

segment.source: You also can group them so that you can change the properties of nested groups simultaneously.
segment.target: You also can group them so that you can change the properties of nested groups simultaneously.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: You must have one or more application groups under the Applications node to move applications.
segment.target: You must have one or more application groups under the Applications node to move applications.

segment.source: To move an application
segment.target: To move an application

segment.source: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, expand Applications.
segment.target: In the left pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console, expand Applications.

segment.source: Highlight the application you want to move.
segment.target: Highlight the application you want to move.

segment.source: Right-click the application and choose Move.
segment.target: Right-click the application and choose Move.

segment.source: In the Select Target window, navigate to the group in which you want to place this group.
segment.target: In the Select Target window, navigate to the group in which you want to place this group.

segment.source: Click OK.
segment.target: Click OK.

segment.source: The applications now appear under the target group.
segment.target: The applications now appear under the target group.

segment.source: This move does not change the properties of the group or its applications, and it does not move any of the application's files on the server.
segment.target: This move does not change the properties of the group or its applications, and it does not move any of the application's files on the server.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You can select and move multiple application groups simultaneously.
segment.target: You can select and move multiple application groups simultaneously.

segment.source: In the right pane, use the CTRL-click or Shift-click key combinations to select more than one group.
segment.target: In the right pane, use the CTRL-click or Shift-click key combinations to select more than one group.
